EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for Joining Us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We hope you enjoyed our webinar, Pivotal HAWQ and Hortonworks Data Platform: Modern Data Architecture for IT Transformation <http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/modern-data-architecture-for-it-transformation>.
This session featured speakers from Pivotal and Hortonworks discussing how, featuring a massively-parallel processing (MPP) SQL query engine that runs directly in the compute resources of a Hadoop cluster, Pivotal HAWQ <http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-hawq> and the Hortonworks Data Platform <http://hortonworks.com/hdp/> provide businesses with a Modern Data Architecture for analytics and data science.
For more about the technologies that were discussed in the webinar, check out these resources:
- Hadoop for the Enterprise page <http://pivotal.io/big-data/hadoop> - SQL on Hadoop page <http://pivotal.io/big-data/hadoop/sql-on-hadoop>
- Turbocharge Data Science with Pivotal HAWQ and the Hortonworks Data Platform webinar replay - Hortonworks/Pivotal Partner page <http://hortonworks.com/partner/pivotal/>
Please feel free to share the on-demand replay of the webinar and the slides <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/pivotal-hawq-and-hortonworks-data-platform-modern-data-architecture-for-it-transformation> with your colleagues.
We look forward to sharing more insights with you at our next webinar!
Thanks! The Pivotal & Hortonworks Teams
